entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -13.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 2:57 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -13.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 96.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -15.4°C
Wind: WSW 42 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 70 gusting to 100 this evening then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
